svg.title: DP-02: Velocity-Based Estimation Engine
svg.desc: AI-Enhanced Velocity Estimation System using historical velocity data, team capacity analysis, and AI-powered pattern recognition for accurate, risk-adjusted project estimates
svg.text: Data-driven estimation with historical velocity analysis and confidence modeling

g.text: üîç Seasonal pattern: 15% velocity increase in Q2/Q3
